office: The Energy and Commerce Committee Democratic Staff

managing press inquiries
maintaining strong relationships with reporters who cover the Committee

proven ability to perform under pressure while juggling multiple tasks

office: Ranking Member of the Committee on Education and the Workforce

responding to inquiries from staff both on and off the Committee for advice and counsel
helping develop and advance a pro-worker agenda through legislation, briefings and written materials
providing support to senior-level staff
requirements: a substantive background in labor and employment law and policy
an advanced degree in law or a related field
